code: import React from'react';import{useQuiz}from'../context/QuizContext';import'./ContentLoader.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContentLoader=()=>{const{isLoading,showLoader}=useQuiz();if(!isLoading&&!showLoader)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content-loader ".concat(!isLoading?'hidden':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loader-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loader-logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-brain"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"QuizMaster"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loader-animation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loader-circle",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loader-dot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loader-dot"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loader-dot"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loader-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"loading-text",children:"Loading Amazing Quizzes..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-progress"})})]})]})});};export default ContentLoader;
